name: Bob Block Retro
description:
Do you want a challenging platforming, that will test your skills in a limited amount of time? And maybe with a retro look and feel? Then Bob Block will be the right game for you!

Play through the one challenging level where you need to beat the level before the timer runs out! The game's visuals are inspired from late 80's and early 90's video games.

Controls (Keyboard):

A/D - Move left and right

Space - Jump

Controls (Controller):

Left Joystick - Move left and right

Button Face Button (X for PlayStation, A for Xbox, etc.) - Jump
